How to Add a New Institutional Member

Welcome to the Institutional Member Registration Guide! This guide will help you register an Institutional Member in the system. Follow each step carefully to complete the setup successfully.

Step 1: Access the "Add New Member" Page

  • Log into the application and click on Members in the left sidebar.
  • Select Add a New Member to begin the registration process.

Step 2: Choose Member Type

Select Institutional Member from the Member Type dropdown menu.

Step 3: Enter Institutional Details

  • Institution Name
  • Institution Type (e.g., Company, NGO, School)
  • Date of Incorporation
  • Registration Number
  • Tax PIN
  • Country of Registration
  • Nature of Business

Step 4: Provide Contact Person Details

Enter the details of the official contact person:

  • Full Name
  • Position/Title
  • Phone Number
  • Email Address

Step 5: Add Registered Address

  • Physical Address
  • District
  • Postal Address
  • Email Address
  • Telephone Number

Step 6: Statutory and Compliance Details

  • Is the Institution Resident? — Yes/No
  • Tax Compliance Status
  • Adverse Media Screening Done — Yes/No
  • PEP (Politically Exposed Person) Check

Step 7: Authorized Signatories

Add individuals who are authorized to operate or represent the institution:

  • Full Name
  • Designation
  • Phone Number
  • Email Address
  • ID or Passport Number

Step 8: Account Details

  • Fund Name
  • Fee Category
  • Withdraw Dividends? — Yes/No
  • Agent/Introducer Name (Optional)

Step 9: Bank Details

You may enter the institution’s banking details now or skip and add later.

If Yes: Enter bank name, branch, currency, account name, account number, and account type.
If No: You can continue, but withdrawals will not be available until bank details are added.

Step 10: Upload Required Documents

  • Certificate of Incorporation
  • KRA PIN Certificate
  • Board Resolution
  • ID Copies of Signatories
  • Business Permit (If Applicable)

Step 11: Complete Registration

Click Finish to complete the institutional member registration.

Missing or incorrect fields will be highlighted in red for correction.

End of Institutional Member Registration Guide
